location: Verna Twin Villas - Serene Heights, Selangor

showroom.address: Persiaran Serene Serene Heights 43500 Semenyih Selangor, Malaysia

description: UEM Sunrise is happy to introduce our first semi-detached homes in Serene Heights - Verna Twin Villas! Verna Twin Villas offers a limited number of units with a standard lot size of 35’ x 80’ and 2,567 sq. ft built up area. Discover a new lifestyle horizon at Verna Twin Villas, where the joy of contemporary living is shared together. Come home to happiness, register now!
